title: Don't be scalped

description: Safe clothing for femal machine operators in industry. Shows a young woman in ordinary street dress beside a machine and indicates the risks in long hair, jewellery, light high-heeled shoes and full skirts. Compares this with proper caps, overalls, gloves and heavy shoes. Gives some advice on how to lift objects without strain.
